title: Charlie Rabbit's Adventures - The complete collection
description: A collection of eight children's short bedtime stories to encourage imagination and learn about loyalty and friendship.Ages 4-8 years.Includes 'Charlie Rabbit The Easter Bunny' previously a number one bestselling Kindle title 'Short Story Collections' at Amazon.com 2012Contents: 1.Charlie Rabbit Discovers Christmas Day. 2.Charlie Rabbit & The "Haunted House" 3.Charlie Rabbit Goes Fishing 4.Charlie Rabbit - "The Easter Bunny" 5.Charlie Rabbit Goes Pony Riding. 6.Charlie Rabbit Goes To The Seaside. 7.Charlie Rabbit - Train to Funtown Park. 8.Charlie Rabbit Goes To The Zoo.
author: Ian   Davies
